title:
The best approximation by trigonometric polynomials of classes of
  convolutions generated by some linear combinations of periodic kernels
abstract:
For arbitrary nontrivial linear combinations of a finite number of Poisson
kernels, the fulfillment of the Nagy condition is established for all numbers
n, starting from some number. It is also proved for any n the existence of
linear combinations of m Bernoulli kernels and linear combinations of m
conjugate Poisson kernels that satisfy the Nikolsky condition and at the same
time do not satisfy the Nagy condition.
